newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Nov copper exports fall 3.8 pct.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Nov copper exports fall 3.8 pct.

text.p: China's exports of uncast and raw copper slumped 3.8 percent to 103,402 tonnes in the first 11 months, customs figures showed on Monday.
Exports of uncast and raw copper in November alone were 13,838 tonnes, it said.
Exports of uncast copper including alloys rose 20.5 percent to 38,668 tonnes in the first 11 months.
Exports of uncast copper including alloys reached 5,282 tonnes in November alone.
China's imports of uncast and raw copper rose 33.0 percent to 627,389 tonnes in the first 11 months, the figures showed.
Imports of uncast and raw copper reached 77,819 tonnes in November alone.
Imports of uncast copper including alloys were up 60.1 percent to 253,785 tonnes in the first 11 months.
Imports of uncast copper including alloys were 36,822 tonnes in November alone.
